programme.desc: The Wattersons must survive a bizarre game of Dodj or Daar through to the end. / Darwin has promised to play video games with Gumball but his promise with Banana Joe interferes. / Gumball and Darwin must apologise to everyone they know after getting a threatening message on Elmore Plus. / Gumball and Darwin try to understand Jukes urgent beatbox message. / Richard is left in charge for the day but his lack of rules attracts unwanted guests to the Watterson house. / Gumball and Darwin fail to make some instant homemade movie classics. / Gumball and Darwins reputation is challenged and they really couldnt care less... / Gumball accidentally uploads a video of himself and wants it gone. / The Watterson kids come up with a fool-proof plan.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin try to understand Jukes urgent beatbox message. / Richard is left in charge for the day but his lack of rules attracts unwanted guests to the Watterson house. / Gumball and Darwin fail to make some instant homemade movie classics. / Gumball and Darwins reputation is challenged and they really couldnt care less...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Richard is left in charge for the day, but his lack of rules attracts unwanted guests to the Watterson house.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Gumball and Darwin decide its time they join a crew, they agree that the coolest posse in Elmore is the senior citizens. They do everything they can to fit in with them, going to extraordinary lengths to prove themselves worthy of running with them.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Sunny Seagull hires The Looney Builders to build a carnival on Looneyburgs pier.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders take turns distracting Petunia as they build her a big surprise birthday cake in the back yard.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build a float to lead the Flower Parade, but Porky wont settle for anything less than Porky Perfect.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is locked in a department store overnight and has the time of his life. / Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wickets nephew. He decides he must have his own console, only to discover how expensive they are. / Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair. / Mr Bean dog sits for Irma and gets the idea for a new dog-walking business - how hard can it be?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wickets nephew. He decides he must have his own console, only to discover how expensive they are. But as luck would have it, he arrives at the shop at closing time to discover that tomorrow there will be a special sale. All he has to do is be first in line …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair. He is forced to dress up as Mrs. Wicket when Brian the Delivery Man wont deliver the chair to anyone but Mrs. Wicket. Then Brian falls in love with "her" and asks "her" out on a date. Bean accepts because hes starving hungry. How long can he keep up the deception? Long enough to fill his stomach?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Animation based on the highly popular live action series of the same name, with many of the same characters including the hapless Mr. Bean himself, his long-suffering girlfriend Irma Gobb, Teddy and the mysterious driver of the Reliant Supervan. Two new characters appear, Beans landlady Mrs Wicket and her evil one-eyed moggy Scrapper. The series features little actual dialogue, just the famous mumblings and mild slapstick.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Mush-Mush is very proud he invented a new game called Fruity Bounce, where he and his friends bounce as high as possible on the bouncier fruits they can find. Little did he know, the Mushups were fruit-bouncing way before he, Chep and Lilit did. So, Mush-Mush decides that if he cant be the inventor of the game, hell at least be the best at it. Mushlers vs Mushups, game on !

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Pimedus tundub millegiparast alati ohtlik. Tana peab Murkel pimedusekartusest jagu saama.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Seenemikud otsustavad minna uksikut saart otsima, et vaadata, kui kanged seiklejad nad õigupoolest on.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Truff is happy. He has found a necklace that makes him even Truffier! Except he had no idea the necklace belongs to Starmush. And the Mushelder promised there will be consequences for whoever took it. Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit now have to save Truff from being consequenced…

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: In order to win a trophy filled with Yummy candies, Grizzy and the Lemmings take part in a safari photo competition on an animal reserve. They must capture the portraits of a number of wild animals that live in the park. It requires all their cunning to approach the elephant, wart hog and bat and take photos for the contest. But when it comes to the super-speedy, blue-necked ostrich, its a different kettle of fish!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: While Grizzy organizes a picnic alongside the pond, the Lemmings steal his jar of Yummy using water balls to discreetly advance underwater. Despite their equipment, the bear surprises the Lemmings and traps the rodents inside a waterproof ball which he throws far into the distance. An ostrich mistakes the ball for her egg and sits on it, waiting for the egg to hatch. The Lemmings are adopted by this new mother who is prepared to do anything to satisfy her offspring!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Chased by a raging elephant, Grizzy and the Lemmings are ejected from the cabin and land on a small nearby promontory. One of the rodents finds himself seated upon a throne-shaped boulder. A ray of sunlight illuminates him, and the savannah animals bow down before the Lemming king! But as soon as he leaves his royal seat, his powers disappear. Grizzy grabs the opportunity to plop down on the throne. Upon his orders, the other animals seek to provide him with every comfort, bringing the cabin, television and food closer. But the Lemmings put their feet down.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy is brutally awakened by four Lemmings who are giving a grand percussion concert near the cabin, while the rest of the group dances to the rhythm. The grumpy bear puts an end to the festivities by propelling the Lemmings into the distance. When they land, they discover a magical djembe inside the trunk of a baobab tree. When the percussionists start playing again, the Lemmings and all the other wild animals are possessed by the demon of dance!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: In the midst of a heat wave, Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the fridge. The rodents want to transform themselves into ice cubes to glide across their super curling ice slide, while Grizzy wishes merely to lie down inside the nice, cool appliance. After literally breaking the fridge in two, the Lemmings discover a container of refrigerant and create a new giant curling sheet in the savannah. But Grizzy has not given up the idea of resting in a cool spot!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy has gone all out for his dinner guest, the she-bear. But just as he is about to kiss her… Vroom! In the middle of a mad car race, the Lemmings wake him up with a jolt! Dragged out of his slumber and swept away upon a vehicle, Grizzy finishes the race in a daze. Not far away, the Lemmings find a mask that can control dreams. Once Grizzy gathers his wits, he wants only to get hold of the object and return to the she-bear of his dreams. But the Lemmings have other dreams, like high-powered racing cars.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy watches a documentary on salmon, whereas the Lemmings want to dance it up in the garage, nightclub style. TV versus music, the sonic war has begun! When a cloud passes overhead, Grizzy realizes that their respective gadgets run on electricity provided by solar panels. No more sun, no more electricity! He devises a plan whereby he will be the only one to access the energy, but the Lemmings have not said their last word!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A confrontation between Grizzy and the Lemmings leads to a room in the castle tower. The bear accidentally sets off a mechanism and discovers a large medieval magic trunk. Indeed, when placed inside, the trunk can blend two objects into one! The Lemmings are quicker and get their hands on the trunk, then set out to play with objects they have enhanced. But its Grizzy who discovers the formula that makes you ultra-powerful.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wickets Nephew is staying with her when he wins two tickets to an Outward Bound course. She refuses to go but then ropes in Bean to look after the child. The two start a competition to see who will win the trophy. Bean is a relentless competitor winning everything up until the point things start getting out of hand …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Inspired by a wildlife documentary on TV, Mr. Bean dusts off his camera and treks deep into the countryside in search of the perfect wildlife photograph. After two fruitless days of being the hunter, he is somewhat miffed to find himself the hunted.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Whilst browsing the supermarket for lovely grub, Mr. Beans life-long pal, Teddy, is kidnapped. Bean tracks down the nasty men responsible and finds that Teddy is not their only captive. Mr. Bean rescues a hundred teddy bears once their ears are put through an industrial sewing machine.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wickets Nephew is staying with her when he wins two tickets to an Outward Bound course. She refuses to go but then ropes in Bean to look after the child. / Whilst out snapping nature with his camera Mr Bean gets angry when nature snaps back. / Bean discovers that in the world of organised crime a teddy isnt always a teddy. Sometimes its a rabbit. / Mr Bean cant find a parking space so he makes one of his own.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Our Mushlers learn that Mushpie absolutely cannot resist an adorable look.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Chanterelle absolutely loves everything about bark-boarding... until she tries it!

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Everyone thinks that Puff has done what no Mushable has ever done before - touched Muddlers mud pile. But has he really?

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Chep offers to look after the Golden Compost while Sushi-Mushi is away. But it smells so delicious that the Mushables will do anything to taste it. Its up to Chep to stop them!

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: When Chanterelle comes across something Mush-Mush has made, she declares him a genius artist!

programme.title: Moley
programme.desc: Squirm and Manny get into a sticky situation when a plant comes to life and tries to eat them!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: On the way to Ozmas weekly picnic, Dorothy and friends come upon Blinkie, a cranky old former witch who lost her powers long ago. To everyones dismay, Dorothy invites Blinkie along. But she ends up loving it! Blinkie is overjoyed at the fun and friendship and is invited back the next week. The Wicked Witch gets a whiff of this and cant believe it! She lost her powers once and she didnt hang out with those goody-goodies. Maybe Blinkie needs help remembering her wicked roots, and her powers back. And the Wicked Witch has found a way to do it so Blinkie betrays her new friends in the process.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: The Wicked Witch is getting tired of the Wizards newfound honesty. She liked it better when he was a cheat and a schemer. So she slips him a gold coin thatll give him a little magical nudge that makes him more like his old self again. And pretty soon, hes back to scamming everyone, including his friends! When his greed gets Dorothy and friends into a tight spot, hes got to decide what he values more: money or his friends!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Getting jealous of Wilhelminas pet Salvador the Wicked Witch decides she should have a creature of her own. But not a pet a familiar! A human spirit trapped in an animals body that will do her bidding! And shes got just the animal a black cat. As well as just the right human spirit Dorothy! She transforms Dorothy and the gang into black cats. So its up to Toto to get over his animosity towards cats so he and the guys can rescue Dorothy from the Wicked Witchs clutches!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.sub-title: Guardians of the Gates of Yawn
programme.desc: The Wicked Witch follows a clue on the silver slippers to Emerald City Clock Tower, putting all the guards in her way to sleep with a very powerful potion. But she gets more than she bargained for when she accidentally sets off every single alarm clock in the whole place and awakens the Quox, a giant silver beast slumbering beneath Emerald City! While Dorothy and friends are preoccupied with trying to deal with that thing, the witches dive deep into the tunnel the Quox came from for signs of the silver slippers. Dorothy and friends figure out the only way to deal with the beast is to put it back to sleep. And the only way to do it is by stealing the Wicked Witchs sleeping potion!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: When a meteor comes crashing to Oz, Dorothy and the gang discover that it contains a clue that could lead them to the location of the silver slippers, all the way up on the moon! Enlisting the help of Smith and Tinker, the guys build a space ship that sends them right to the moon. But the Wicked Witch and Wilhelmina are right on their tail with a rocket ship of their own. Dorothy and friends land on the moon and with the help of the moons residents, the Moonies, they find the clue that may finally lead them to the silver slippers location. But the Wicked Witch is determined to get it first.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have got their hands on a pack of white beans which have very strange properties: when mixed with soda, anyone who eats them turns into a bouncing ball. Grizzy realizes that if he wants to take a nap, he must first get rid of the magic beans.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Joonisfilm raagib grislikarust nimega Grizzy ja mitmest lemmikust.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Joonisfilm raagib grislikarust nimega Grizzy ja mitmest lemmikust.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Its the First Day of Spring and Mr. Bean sets about washing his clothes, his furniture, his teddy and himself. But, alas, theres no hot water! A bit of inventive improvisation with an outside drainpipe proves Mr. Bean to be greener at D.I.Y. plumbing than he thought.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is shocked when Teddy receives a birthday card from Beans girlfriend, Irma Gobb. The bears Birthday had completely slipped his mind. And what do you get for the teddy that has everything? A morning in a toy shop, burgers for lunch and a slap up tea party, of course. (But only if you can afford it.)

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: A mockingbird relentlessly mocks Tom and Jerry and the insults really fly when the eggs hatch and the baby mockingbirds taunt the cat too. Time for these birds to fly the coop! / The witch sisters are brewing their latest concoction. / After working hard to get Tom to drift off to sleep Jerry heads for the coveted wedge of cheese in the kitchen. / Butch and Meathead dont want to miss a marathon of their favorite show so they make a deal with Tom to trade a little TV time for a treasure map. / Feeling bad for giving Toms precious blanket to Badwill, Jerrys determined to get it back. Unfortunately, retrieving gifted items from Badwill is not easy. / Tom gets a can of Cat Cop a spray that creates a tiny cop. Director: Darrell Van Citters,.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Its Spikes birthday, but Rick has forgotten about it. Tom and Jerry work together to give the pooch a birthday to remember, but unfortunately their every effort backfires. / Hi-jinx ensue when Jerry decides to mock-up a "REWARD IF FOUND" poster with Toms picture on it and listing the address of the neighbour with the ferocious dog as Toms home... / Tom finds himself in a series of unfortunate events. / Butch and Meathead dont want to miss a marathon of their favorite show so they make a deal with Tom to trade a little TV time for a treasure map. / Tom gets a can of Cat Cop a spray that creates a tiny cop. / Rick and Ginger are taking care of their "adorable" niece. Director: Darrell Van Citters,.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry accidentally get locked out in the snow. They chase each other in the winter wonderland until they realize they cant get back in. They work together to get back indoors as the weather turns ugly.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: An evil ringmaster recruits Tom to help him snare the Catsylvania mice.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry must keep Lil Quacker safe from Butch and Meathead so that he can testify to a crime in court.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom Jerry Van Mouseling and the village mice must deal with a howling three head dog that Tom has accidentally awakened. / Tom must cut fire wood for the Manor fireplaces while Jerry harasses him. / A robot turns from friend to foe forcing Tom Jerry Spike and Tuffy to team up in order to rid themselves of the invader. Director: Darrell Van Citters,.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Its a night out at the theatre for the Docs but when they spot Lamput in the front row, they decide to give up their night of culture for a night of capture! Lamput escapes backstage where he morphs from scenery into props, then into costume and eventually ends up on stage! The Docs make chase, and end up becoming part of the performance too, much to the Directors dismay. Can the show go on? Or will it be a total flop?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Boss is writing his new novel but he finds it extremely hard to focus with all the noise and disturbance at the lab. Looking for some tranquillity, Boss finally settles inside the old cannon at launch pad of the lab and accidentally gets fired out all the way to the moon!! Its completely quiet on the moon, just what Boss needs. He cant stop writing. Back at the lab, they build a rocket to bring Boss back! Hopefully boss gets to finish his novel first.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput faints of thirst on a desert highway, so already its not a great day for the little orange shape-shifter. Add to that the fact that Specs and Skinny just happen by in a lockup van, and things go south pretty promptly. Specs and Skinny learn a valuable lesson: maybe if youre going to anger a morphing super-blob by throwing them in the back of a van and withholding precious water, you shouldnt do it whilst driving by a 100 foot cliff drop down to the open ocean. Hopefully these Docs are better swimmers than your average academic.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Batwings favorite Bat-Net gets ripped during a chase with Riddler, she must learn to let go of her old net (despite it being her favorite) if shes going to help Batman stop the Riddler in his tracks.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship and more. When Bam is sent to take on Prank, Redbird is forced to hang back because the Jokers van is too dangerous - when Bam then discovers that Redbird secretly tagged along, hes upset until the point that Redbird has to bail him out of a tight spot.

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: Alice unintentionally makes a perfect double of herself then uses it to play jokes on her friends. But when her double disappears in order to plan a big prank on the Queen, Alice and Lewis rush to the castle to protect the monarch during the Cards parade and teatime.

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: Lewis is very proud when the Queen asks him to watch over little Charlie until teatime! Only problem is, Charlie is insisting on helping the rabbit feed his clocks cogs and hes way too small! So Lewis calls on Alice so she can look after the boy while Lewis is busy. Miffed, Charlie gulps down what he thought was growing syrup: oops, it was actually shrinking syrup! Then he runs into the jungle of cogs inside the clock. Upshot: Alice and Lewis have no choice but to drink some of the same syrup and head off to look for Charlie in among the turning cogs and gears!

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: Determined to save the community garden, Barney and the kids go on a magical adventure where they become butterflies, and help a little ladybug with a big problem. They ultimately learn that doing small things can affect big change!

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: David cant agree on what to play, so the kids end up playing different games. Barney has a hard time keeping up with both games. Silly chaos ensues, and David is reminded that its important to consider others perspectives, too.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Its the night of the Big Dance, and Skinny has some serious moves ready to go. Shame well never get to see them; Skinny practices so hard that he renders himself unconscious. Luckily Skinny has a guardian angel in the form of a morphing orange blob. Lamput tries everything to wake Skinny back up, but nothing works; Lamput is gonna have to go above and beyond. Skinny (still out cold) shows up to the dance in a bright orange suit that seems to have a life of its own, and proceeds to tear up the dancefloor. When Skinny finally comes to, he finds out he was the hit of the big dance. Skinny walks off with the trophy and the gal. No-one thinks to thank lil Lamput. For a sworn enemy, this blob sure is a good friend.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Spike hasnt been the best role model for his boy when it comes to being a good sport. You could even say Spikes a sore loser. Thats why Spike recruits Tom and Jerry to help teach the little guy how to lose gracefully. When Tom beats Tyke at a game of tic-tac-toe Tyke puts the "sore" into "sore loser" by biting Toms finger when Tom extends it for a friendly post-game handshake. Tom forces Jerry to take turns playing various games with Tyke (e.g. Checkers, basketball, hopscotch, etc…). Each time they win, Tyke takes it out on them. When Tom and Jerry start throwing the games, Spikes right there to dole out his own punishment for letting Tyke win. Sometimes you just cant win!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tuffy and Jerry are brushing their teeth. Tuffys so tired he uses Jerrys tail instead of his toothbrush. They climb in their respective beds, only Tuffys not in his bed, hes in the palm of Toms hand that Toms made-up to look like a bed. Tom gets walloped for his little stunt but it points out to Jerry that he needs a safer home. What begins with Jerry securing his home from Tom, turns into an arms race between the cat and mouse where they each build their own booby-trapped bunker to protect themselves from each other. They turn out to be their own greatest enemy, with the biggest threat coming from their own creations. In the end, they go back to their relatively safer existence.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: While using a wand to make inanimate objects come to life to attack Jerry, Tom accidentally zaps a marionette (Marie Antoin-marionette). Now the cat and mouse have more on their hands than either one of them can handle! Sure the marionette pulls Hildie and Beaties heart-strings when they are around (both are thrilled to have another girl in the house even if she is made of wood), but the doll delights in getting Tom into trouble when the witch sisters arent looking. When Marie becomes too much for even Jerry to bear, Tom and Jerry have to figure out how to get rid of the little hellion! They brought her into this world, now theyve got to take her out!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Its summer and Spikes the primary beneficiary of Ricks daily grilling ritual; the pooch is tossed a nice juicy T-bone nightly. When Spike gets stuck trying to exit the doghouse, he realises its time to back off the beef. Spike orders Tom to hide the tempting T-bones and no matter what he says or does dont let him have them! Of course its a lose-lose scenario for Tom: Spike becomes angry if Tom caves in to his demands and gives him the steaks and even angrier if he doesnt! When Jerry moves one of the nightly T-bones from Toms latest hiding place, it triggers a series of unfortunate events when Spikes hunger becomes too much. In the end, Spike loses the extra weight from chasing Tom. And when Jerry cant fit in his mouse hole because of the weight hes gained, justice is served!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Little Quacker is heartsick and hes come to the cat and mouse detectives to help mend his broken heart. You see, the duck fell in love at first quack with a bird he met luxuriating in the central park pond. The courtship went south (literally) when Quackers honey coo-coo migrated with her flock. All that Quacker has left of her is a single feather and hes counting on the cat and mouse detectives to find his one true love. Prince Charming had an easier time finding Cinderella with a glass slipper, but Tom and Jerry arent about to fly the coop. In the end, they find the owner of the lost feather and reunite the two lovebirds who fly off into the sunset.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry accidentally get locked out in the snow. They chase each other in the winter wonderland until they realize they cant get back in. They work together to get back indoors as the weather turns ugly.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Theres easy money to be had in the art world and Mr. Bean is set on getting some of it. Once equipped with the right tools, he ventures into the countryside with a blank canvas in search of inspiration - and comes home with a painting full of life. Literally.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: When Mr. Bean finds a fly in his room, its war. He needs weapons. Fly spray? A rolled-up magazine? These are only the start. In desperation, he enlists a mouldy doughnut, an encyclopaedia, an upside-down dustbin and a club-hammer. Finally, Bean becomes the first man in history to wage war on a fly... with a fridge.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs run out of puff and decide to cut some corners. All it takes is a sharpie, as it happens; just change a wanted poster to offer a huge reward, and bingo! The public are gonna do your work for you. Weirdly quickly, a hard-boiled granny shows up with Lamput under her arm. Things turn ugly when she actually expects to be paid the reward. Most unreasonable. Not even an odd-jobs montage can pay this giant bill; the Docs get desperate and turn to crime, which works about as well for them as it usually does. Specs and Skinny end up in the clink, the granny pockets a heap of cash, and Lamput is yet again the one that got away.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: Determined to save the community garden, Barney and the kids go on a magical adventure where they become butterflies, and help a little ladybug with a big problem. They ultimately learn that doing small things can affect big change!

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: David cant agree on what to play, so the kids end up playing different games. Barney has a hard time keeping up with both games. Silly chaos ensues, and David is reminded that its important to consider others perspectives, too.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Buff makes a wish on a magic artifact for the other Batwheels to be turned into monster trucks, just like him! F

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. When Jestah injures herself preparing for an extreme sports competition with the other Zoomers, Bibi helps her overcome her fear of going to the mechanic so she can heal up and compete.

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: Following a mess-up by Alice, the Queen shamelessly decides to hold her teatime ritual on the Moon, without asking its permission. During this "incursion," Alice and Lewis do all they can to keep the satellite and its odd inhabitants (Moon-Cutie-Twees, who clean the moon all year round) from being disturbed. But unfortunately, the Queen gets it into her head to build a "vacation home" on the Moon! Theres only one way to get her out of there: her castle must be invaded!

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: In order to escape punishment, Dodson kids the Queen into believing he is able to read the future. Falling for his story, Queen names him "Great Fortune-Telling Dodo" and invites him to live in the castle. Dodson milks it, using his influence over the monarch to fulfill all his desires, even if it means relieving poor Lewis of his clockmaster duties! Luckily, Alice runs to her rabbit friends rescue. But how are they going to prove to the Queen that Dodson doesnt actually have a single power and that hes merely using her for his own benefit?!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Specs and Skinny spruce themselves up and head out to a piano concerto in the royal concert hall. Theyre on their best behavior, until they spot a fellow culture vulture who also happens to be small, orange and squishy. Honestly, theyre letting all sorts of rabble into these places these days. The Docs decide that a sleeping potion might be a quick and quiet way of capturing Lamput. Naturally things get out of hand, and when the entire audience catches a whiff of the snoozy brew, we find out exactly how hard it is to stay awake during a classical music recital. One star.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Toms assigned laundry duty at the estate and Jerrys determined to soil the job.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Its the battle of the moustaches when Tom accidentally drinks a hair tonic potion left behind by Jerry - and Butch realizes he needs to acquire some facial hair of his own if he is to compete for Toodles and Dollfaces attentions.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Its the hottest day ever and Spike is building a swimming pool for his son Tyke. When Tom and Jerry get kicked out of the house for being too destructive Spike enlists their help. Spike must do everything he can from losing his temper in front of Tyke when Tom and Jerry fail to do things the right way.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs spot Lamput in the audience of a magic show and try to catch him. The chase takes them backstage where Lamput evades the Docs with the help of different magic contraptions until Specs and Skinny unknowingly ends up on stage. They become reluctant assistants to the Magician who is about to perform some death-defying tricks - with the help of the Docs!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: While trying to escape from the Docs, Lamput stumbles into a hole in the ground, which leads in an underground civilization with a large tribe in it! Lamput gets misunderstood as the Chosen One according to the tribes prophecy. The tribe hails Lamput as the prophet and this proves to be a huge challenge for the Docs to catch Lamput, now that Lamput is surrounded by worshippers and guards at all times!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs cant keep up with Lamput and he manages to escape them at every move. Inspired by the animals at a local zoo, the Docs build a machine to harness the animal prowess. Maybe now they can be as fast as a cheetah and outrun Lamput!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean has to look after Mrs Wickets pet goldfish while she is away. With a ravenous Scrapper sniffing around Bean ends up becoming more bodyguard than babysitter. But when he manages to lose his fishy friend Mr Bean takes a nightmare journey down the sewer and back to his neighbours house via the park. Can Mr Bean get the pesky pet back in the bowl before Mrs Wicket returns home?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean wins two tickets for an exotic cruise and naturally he takes Teddy along for the trip of a lifetime. Once aboard the huge ocean liner Mr Bean soon settles into a life of luxury but while showing off to a new friend Bean becomes "man overboard" and stranded on a dessert island. The hungrier he gets the wilder he becomes and desperate to find a way off the island.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his favourite china shop to buy a new cup for Teddy but when he opens his wallet he doesnt have enough money to pay for it. When he sees a poster for the local funfair where the stalls have cash prizes Bean is determined to win himself some money on the Coconut Shy. But after many unsuccessful attempts he realises its a fix and lets everyone know about it. Naturally this doesnt go down well with the stallholder who wants revenge and a chase around the funfair ensues.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Beans electricity supply is cut off when Mrs Wicket sees the cost of her enormous electricity bill. As the snow falls outside Mr Beans flat becomes so cold that there are ice cubes in his bath water. Mr Bean has the idea to build a huge wind turbine in the back garden providing his own power. All is going very well until an unexpected storm sends Beans wind turbine into overdrive creating a huge surge of electricity and a huge shock for everyone

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs are so obsessed with catching Lamput that even in their dreams, the chase goes on. Its really not a restful sleep, when you keep waking up sweating from horrid visions that, lets face it, just remind you what a nightmare your day job is. The Docs make the brave decision to see a therapist about these terrible dreams. In the waiting room is the last orange blob they wanted to see; apparently a life of hot pursuit is taking its toll on Lamput, too. The shrink will have to resort to some very unconventional treatments.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings love sesame nougat but Grizzy, who adores this treat too, steals their box. Quite upset, the rodents search for more, in vain. Instead, they discover the art of energy points in an old Chinese medicine book. Determined to recover their sweets regardless of the cost, the Lemmings activate Grizzys vital points and the bear finds himself completely blocked. Thanks to the book, Grizzy frees himself and learns to master energies in turn.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: After a game that ends abruptly, the Lemmings fall onto the roof of a temple where they discover drawings of Tai Chi movements. When carried out, the exercises generate a ball of energy! The Lemmings test out the sequence of movements on… Grizzy, until he is evicted from the cabin and falls onto the temple in turn. His fall unveils a new sequence of movements on a fresco that could create an even stronger energy flow!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: After being thrown out of the log cabin by Grizzy, the Lemmings find a dragon statue with a mysterious stone in a temple. Touching the stone makes a fleeting tattoo appear on their bellies, temporarily endowing them with the mastery of Shaolin Kung Fu. The Lemmings return to the cabin and uproot Grizzy with ease! But Grizzy has not said his last word and manages to get hold of the magic stone.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the tablet. During their scuffle, they knock over an army crate which falls into the middle of the bamboo forest surrounding the cabin. Alerted by the noise, a peace missionary panda comes out of the forest and tries to calm down the worked-up adversaries. But will the limitless strategies of Grizzy and the Lemmings get the better of the pandas patience?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings create a shadow puppet show where seven papercut lemmings confront a bear over a jar of Yummy chocolate spread. The Lemmings in the audience are super enthusiastic, but Grizzy is outraged by the treatment inflicted upon the bear. He decides to intervene and equips the paper bear with an armor and saber! The Lemmings retort with ninja effigies of themselves and mount an attack to recover the coveted jar of Yummy spread.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: As Grizzy relaxes in the massage chair, a cloud drifts in front of the sun, immediately stopping the electricity supply in the log cabin. The voltage drops continue, even though the sky seems clear now. Grizzy looks out the window and a dragon appears on the horizon! Once over his initial fright, the bear realizes that its only a kite flown by the Lemmings - using the electricity from the cabin they have rerouted!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The animated antics of the hapless bumbler Mr. Bean. Mr. Bean finds a treasure map in a dark and cobwebby corner of his attic, but its tricky clues lead him up the chimney, round the bend, down the garden path, up the blinking wall and nearly all the way to Australia!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: After a regrettable episode involving his landlady sleepwalking into his room, Mr. Bean suddenly finds himself out on his ear with nowhere to live. Near to tears, he yearns for the cosy familiarity of his old home. A scarecrow and a pair of false teeth come to his rescue.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: An old photo album causes Bean to reminisce about his lovely summers at scout camp as a boy, and sets him planning a night under the stars with Teddy. Purchasing a tent becomes a tricky problem - but nothing will stop him having a good time, even if he has to get the garden shed over the roof of his house.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The animated antics of the hapless bumbler Mr. Bean. When his model aeroplane is blown out of the sky by a rival childs plane, Mr. Bean sets his sights on revenge - when the next day comes, his newly-constructed fighter plane is almost ready for take-off, but it lacks a vital part and the local model shop is shut! This doesnt matter, though - soon the plane is chocks away with Teddy at the controls and fighting for airspace over London N10.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: When Mr. Bean breaks his favourite Royal mug he discovers theres only one place to buy a replacement: Buckingham Palace, home of the Queen of England. When one of Her Majestys corgis runs off with his teddy, Bean gives chase through secret tunnels… and gets lost.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: When did Mr. Bean first meet his teddy bear? Did he really learn to drive his mini at the age of ten? Could he possibly have known his battle-axe of a landlady when she was a sweet and blushing bride? Bean takes us on a journey into the past, answering these questions and giving us an inkling as to what made him the man he is today.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean finds himself lumbered with an unwanted pet in the form of a four-legged ball of pink fur with piggy eyes and a penchant for earthworms. Encyclopedias leave him none the wiser as to the identity of the pesky creature but Bean cant bring himself to just abandon it. The puzzle is eventually solved after a picnic in the park and a raid on the local pet shop.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean forgets the golden rule: never fall asleep in the bath when youve got a chicken in the oven. So what romantic meal can he quickly rustle-up for his luckless girlfriend, Irma Gobb? The cheese from the mousetrap? The flower from the vase? A meal is eventually provided by an uninvited guest.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Joonisfilm raagib grislikarust nimega Grizzy ja mitmest lemmikust.

Grizzy has no other choice but to requisition the Lemmings propulsion game to recover his possession. But try and make a Lemming understand that!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy has got it into his head to offer a butterfly to the she-bear hes in love with. But the Lemmings fight with him over the rare specimens hes spotted, for they want to play helicopter. The butterfly hunt is on!

programme.desc: Joonisfilm raagib grislikarust nimega Grizzy ja mitmest lemmikust.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Unwilling to share the food both he and the Lemmings are wild about, Grizzy locks it up inside the rangers brand new and apparently burglar-proof safe. He watches the Lemmings vain attempts to open the safe with amusement, until he realizes that the string around his neck with the key is far from indestructible.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy is impressed by the TV show of a magician who transforms a partridge into a bouquet of flowers. To get rid of the Lemmings once and for all, for they exasperate him with their incessant games, Grizzy tries the magic trick on them. And apparently... it works!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Joonisfilm raagib grislikarust nimega Grizzy ja mitmest lemmikust.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Bam is covered in super bouncy Bounce X goo during a chase with Prank, he must learn to embrace and use his newfound bouncing abilities to his advantage if hes going to put a stop to Pranks latest scheme.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bam must learn to adapt and try something new as hes tasked to dive the Bat Big Rig all the way to Star City, while the Legion of Zoom chases after him.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwing and Goldie secretly decide to participate in the Gotham Air-Show.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Grundy, a giant monster truck, causes chaos as he stomps around Gotham and creates a mess. Hes too powerful for the Batwheels to stop, but Buff finds a friendly solution to end the city shaking shenanigans.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: After a hot cocoa disaster, Santa Claus hires The Looney Builders to build him a new toyshop in time to save Christmas.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The first episode of an animated series for young viewers that follows Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use amazing vehicles to take on the looniest construction jobs while learning lessons along the way. Mayor Foghorn Leghorn hires the Looney Builders to build a giant water slide for Looneyburgs water-park.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Animated series for young viewers that follows Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use amazing vehicles to take on the looniest construction jobs while learning lessons along the way. The Looney Builders build Taz a huge ice cream sundae for his birthday, but the ice cream starts to melt when Porky worries about making a mistake and delays the build.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Animated series for young viewers that follows Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use amazing vehicles to take on the looniest construction jobs while learning lessons along the way. The Looney Builders race against the clock to build a new race track for Cecil Turtle, but Daffy gets caught up in his own desire to race and changes part of the build.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wickets nephew. He decides he must have his own console, only to discover how expensive they are. / Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair. / Mr Bean dog sits for Irma and gets the idea for a new dog-walking business - how hard can it be? / Mr Bean crashes his mini into a pool of slurry and is desperate to get himself and his car clean.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Its Irmas birthday. Bean buys a bargain-bin load of cards, and writes out two - one nice, one silly. He gets his envelopes mixed up and sends off the wrong card. He tries to persuade the postman to hand the card back, but no luck. He winds up causing chaos at the sorting office in a last-ditch attempt to avoid Irmas ire.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean breaks his bed using it as a trampoline. He tries to fix it, but he cant. Next morning, and after an awful nights sleep, he goes to buy a brand-new bed. He has fun trying all the beds out, but the one he wants is too expensive. He is about to get thrown out of the shop when he turns his experience of all the beds to his advantage.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean drives her and Miss Wince to their booked spa retreat; and wait outside in the car until theyre done. Bean gets bored, so bored that he decides to sneak into the spa and get Mrs. Wicket and Miss Wince out. Chased by the irate Receptionist, Bean gets more than he bargained for when he crashes into Mrs. Wickets massage session.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Tana teevad Mikk-Mikk, Kubarapoiss, Lilit ja Truhv bandi.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Tana peab Toss suvepiknikku korraldama. Mis juhtub, kui ta teisi liialt kamandama hakkab?

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Mampel naeb kahtlaselt hea valja. Tana uritavad seenemikud valja selgitada Mampli hea vormi saladuse!

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Tana lahevad seenemikud koos tormi vaatama.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: When the Lemmings spoil Grizzys meal with their new game, the bear evicts them far from the cabin. They crash onto a faraway picnic table. All except one, who bounces off some jelly pudding which was left behind. When the Lemmings discover its highly spongy texture, they invent a whole bunch of new bouncing games. But Grizzy, starving and dinner-deprived, has his eyes on the dessert!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings are holding a log throwing competition that stops short when Grizzy sends them soaring into the distance. The rodents land upon an ancient Celtic site where they happen upon a magic bracelet that increases the strength of whoever wears it tenfold. The Lemmings start the competition over with their new power, only this time using menhirs! A witness to the scene, Grizzy longs for the magic object and imagines everything he could do with the piece of jewelry.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the TV remote control. The argument leads the bear to the summit of the castle tower during a storm. In a secret room, he glimpses a human form by the light of a lightning bolt. Terrified, Grizzy unwittingly sets off a mechanism which had been activated by the lightning, and which brings to life a medieval armor. The living armor bows before the flabbergasted bear. Grizzy has just found a docile and fearsome ally with whom to combat the Lemmings!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have a whale of a time revamping the paintings on display in the castle by painting themselves alongside the illustrated noblemen. But Grizzy wants to paint himself on the next painting and swipes the artwork along with the rodents paint kit. The furious Lemmings are determined to recover their material at all costs. Its the beginning of a dispute that could be qualified as… artsy!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings improvise a trampoline with bagpipes, only each jump is accompanied by a deafening outburst. Grizzy steps in and hurls the object far from the castle. The rodents catch up with it on a mystical nearby isle, where they meet five fairies. One of them breathes life into the musical instrument. The Lemmings return to the castle with five sets of enchanted pipes and catapult Grizzy far away. Its his turn to discover the mysterious isle.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy puts a stop to the Lemmings furious rodeo game on a sheep. Annoyed, they decide to banish the bear to the bottom of the castle dungeons while hes taking a nap. In his prison, Grizzy finds a magic shepherds crook. Now he can direct the neighboring sheep according to his desires. With their help, he manages to escape from his dungeon. He returns to the cabin and settles in on the flock like on a sofa, while the Lemmings stare in disbelief!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: While fighting over a jelly cake, Grizzy banishes the Lemmings to the castle dungeons and the rodents discover a passageway leading to a secret elfin room. The Lemmings activate a secret mechanism, transforming their surroundings into a "heroic fantasy" world where they are elves, the sheep are goblins, and Grizzy is a magician. The jelly cake battle now takes on epic dimensions!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings take Polaroid snapshots of themselves disguised outside the castle along with a sheep who poses with them. But smelling the scent of Grizzys cookies in the cabin, the sheep abandons them. The bears heart is softened by the little ball of wool and consents to share (some of) his snack. He pampers the creature and grows fond of it, but the rodents want their pal back!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Theres easy money to be had in the art world and Mr. Bean is set on getting some of it. Once equipped with the right tools, he ventures into the countryside with a blank canvas in search of inspiration - and comes home with a painting full of life. Literally.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: When Mr. Bean finds a fly in his room, its war. He needs weapons. Fly spray? A rolled-up magazine? These are only the start. In desperation, he enlists a mouldy doughnut, an encyclopaedia, an upside-down dustbin and a club-hammer. Finally, Bean becomes the first man in history to wage war on a fly... with a fridge.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: A leisurely stroll in the park turns into a run when Mr. Bean is chased home by an angry Mime Artist. He is lost for more words than usual when the street performer makes himself at home and insists on being wined and dined. Bean ousts the pest from his house using the only language mime artists understand.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Its the First Day of Spring and Mr. Bean sets about washing his clothes, his furniture, his teddy and himself. But, alas, theres no hot water! A bit of inventive improvisation with an outside drainpipe proves Mr. Bean to be greener at D.I.Y. plumbing than he thought.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: So Bolly can take a break and head off to have fun, our Mushlers insist that they will do all the repairs around Mushton for him. Now Bolly needs to fix all their repairs!

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Puff and our Mushlers set out to try and find out what Fung and Miffs special gifts are without them knowing.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Chep has created a cloak out of a leaf and Chanterelle thinks its super fashionable.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: To finally bring life-long friends Mushpot and Starmush back together, Truff goes to help Starmush succeed at an impossible challenge set by Musho…

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: When Mushpie gets sick, our Mushlers find it impossible to believe that she turns into the most demanding Mushable ever. Well, theyre about to find out that its all true!

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: Take to the skies over Gotham with Batwing and her friend best jet-friend Goldie the Arrowplane!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.sub-title: The Good the Wicked and the Silver: Part 1
programme.desc: When they put all the clues for the silver slippers together, Dorothy and friends discover that the answer is through hole in the ground the Quox made. Taking the drill coaster down through the tunnel, they evade the Quox and end up on the bottom side of the world where the Silver Fortress awaits them. They enter the Fortress, evading traps and magical guards and making it all the way to the top of the highest tower where the silver slippers reside. But just as Dorothy can get her hands on the slippers, the Wicked Witch swipes them away, taking them for herself!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.sub-title: The Good the Wicked and the Silver: Part 2
programme.desc: The Wicked Witch has taken the silver slippers and now the entire Silver Fortress and its silver army is under her command! Dorothy and her friends escape the fortress and go back to Oz to try to warn everyone, but the Wicked Witch is right behind them, riding on the back of the Quox. The Witch tells them that Dorothy must surrender the ruby slippers to her before the silver army gets there and marches on Emerald City. But Dorothy and friends refuse to go down without a fight. And they have some volunteers to help: Baron Fernando Von Soozle, the infamous Witch Hunter, is back. But this time hes brought an entire League of Witch Hunters to help them take on the Wicked Witch. Will it be enough? Well, itll have to do for right now.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: When the Wicked Witch tries to steal a Yoop egg, an Ozian giant, the Yoops parents interfere and the egg winds up in Munchkinland! Dorothy and friends get roped into taking care of the baby Yoop, trying to keep the huge baby clothed and fed until they can figure out where she came from. Meanwhile, the Wicked Witch figures this is a golden opportunity to sick the Yoops parents on Dorothy and the munchkins, creating gigantic havok in Munchkinland!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: The Wicked Witch decides she needs an army to replace the one that she lost and sets her sights on the all-female all-dancing army of General Jinjur. She lures the overworked and over-danced army of Jinjur away from her and has plans to turn their kicks destructive. Jinjur goes to Dorothy for help. They team up to create a new army to get the Witchs one away from her, but the only people theyre able to recruit are Woozy and his friends. Theyre going to have to whip Woozy and the other animals into shape if they stand a chance of defeating the Witchs karate-kicking army.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: When Tin Man is responsible for a series of stopped crimes and rescues, Dorothy remarks how much he reminds her of a superhero from the comic books back in Kansas. Tin Man doesnt know what a superhero is, but when Dorothy explains the concept, he loves the idea and wants to become Ozs first: The Tin Champion! When the Wicked Witch learns of this new hero in Oz, she decides its up to her to take him down before he disrupts any more of her schemes.

programme.desc: Joonisfilm raagib grislikarust nimega Grizzy ja mitmest lemmikust.
